title: Thermodynamics of hot strong-interaction matter from ultrarelativistic nuclear collisions
title_cn: 超相对论核碰撞引起的强相互作用热物质的热力学
abstract: Collisions between heavy atomic nuclei at ultrarelativistic energies are carried out at particle colliders to produce the quark–gluon plasma, a state of matter where quarks and gluons are not confined into hadrons, and colour degrees of freedom are liberated. This state is thought to be produced as a transient phenomenon before it fragments into thousands of particles that reach the particle detectors. Despite two decades of investigations, one of the big open challenges is to obtain an experimental determination of the temperature reached in a heavy-ion collision, and a simultaneous determination of another thermodynamic quantity, such as the entropy density, that would give access to the number of degrees of freedom. Here, we obtain such a determination, utilizing state-of-the-art hydrodynamic simulations. We define an effective temperature, averaged over the spacetime evolution of the medium. Then, using experimental data, we determine this temperature and the corresponding entropy density and speed of sound in the matter created in lead–lead collisions at the Large Hadron Collider. Our results agree with first-principles calculations from lattice quantum chromodynamics and confirm that a deconfined phase of matter is indeed produced.
abstract_cn: 在粒子对撞机上，超相对论能量进行重原子核之间的碰撞，以产生夸克胶子等离子体，即夸克和胶子不限于强子的物质状态，并释放了色自由度。该状态被认为是瞬态现象，然后分解成数千个到达粒子检测器的粒子。尽管进行了数十年的研究，但最大的挑战之一是获得重离子碰撞中达到的温度的实验确定方法，以及同时确定另一个热力学量（例如熵密度）的方法，以便获得自由度数。在这里，我们利用最先进的流体动力学模拟获得了这样的结论。我们定义了一个有效温度，该平均温度是在介质的时空演化过程中平均得出的。然后，使用实验数据，确定在大型强子对撞机中铅碰撞中产生的物质中的温度以及相应的熵密度和声速。我们的结果与基于晶格量子色动力学的第一性原理计算相符，并证实确实产生了限定相。</ p>

title: Measurement and microscopic description of odd–even staggering of charge radii of exotic copper isotopes
title_cn: 奇异铜同位素电荷半径奇偶交错的测量和微观描述
abstract: Nuclear charge radii globally scale with atomic mass number A as A1∕3, and isotopes with an odd number of neutrons are usually slightly smaller in size than their even-neutron neighbours. This odd–even staggering, ubiquitous throughout the nuclear landscape, varies with the number of protons and neutrons, and poses a substantial challenge for nuclear theory. Here, we report measurements of the charge radii of short-lived copper isotopes up to the very exotic 78Cu (with proton number Z = 29 and neutron number N = 49), produced at only 20 ions s–1, using the collinear resonance ionization spectroscopy method at the Isotope Mass Separator On-Line Device facility (ISOLDE) at CERN. We observe an unexpected reduction in the odd–even staggering for isotopes approaching the N = 50 shell gap. To describe the data, we applied models based on nuclear density functional theory and A-body valence-space in-medium similarity renormalization group theory. Through these comparisons, we demonstrate a relation between the global behaviour of charge radii and the saturation density of nuclear matter, and show that the local charge radii variations, which reflect the many-body polarization effects, naturally emerge from A-body calculations fitted to properties of A ≤ 4 nuclei.
abstract_cn: 核电荷半径总体上以原子质量数A为A 1＆＃8725; 3 进行缩放，并且具有奇数个中子的同位素的大小通常比其偶数中子邻居小。这个奇数甚至偶数错列，在核环境中无处不在，随质子和中子的数量而变化，并且对核理论提出了重大挑战。在这里，我们报告了仅在20 s s时产生的直至非常稀有的 78 Cu（质子数Z = 29和中子数N = 49）的短寿命铜同位素的电荷半径的测量值。 ＆＃8211; 1 ，使用位于欧洲核子研究组织（CERN）的同位素质量分离器在线设备设施（ISOLDE）的共线共振电离光谱法。对于接近N = 50壳隙的同位素，我们观察到奇数和偶数交错的意外减少。为了描述数据，我们应用了基于核密度泛函理论和A体价空间中相似相似性重新归一化群论的模型。通过这些比较，我们证明了电荷半径的整体行为与核物质的饱和密度之间的关系，并表明反映多体极化效应的局部电荷半径变化自然是从拟合A体的计算中得出的A＆＃8804;的属性4个核。

title: Dispersions of many-body Bethe strings
abstract: Complex bound states of magnetic excitations, known as Bethe strings, were predicted almost a century ago to exist in one-dimensional quantum magnets. The dispersions of the string states have so far remained the subject of intense theoretical studies. Here, by performing neutron scattering experiments on the one-dimensional Heisenberg–Ising antiferromagnet SrCo2V2O8 in high longitudinal magnetic fields, we reveal in detail the dispersion relations of the string states over the full Brillouin zone, as well as their magnetic field dependencies. Furthermore, the characteristic energy, the scattering intensity and linewidth of the observed string states exhibit excellent agreement with our precise Bethe–ansatz calculations. Our results establish the important role of string states in the quantum spin dynamics of one-dimensional systems, and will invoke studies of their dynamical properties in more general many-body systems.
abstract_cn: 被称为贝特弦（Bethestrings）的磁激发的复杂束缚态在近一个世纪前就被预测存在于一维量子磁体中。 到目前为止，弦状态的分散仍然是激烈的理论研究的主题。 在这里，通过在一维Heisenberg上进行中子散射实验，在高纵向磁场中使用反铁磁体SrCo 2 V 2 O 8 ，我们详细揭示了弦态在整个布里渊区上的色散关系，以及它们的磁场依赖性。 此外，观察到的弦状态的特征能量，散射强度和线宽与我们精确的Bethe＆amp; ansatz计算结果具有极好的一致性。 我们的结果确立了弦态在一维系统的量子自旋动力学中的重要作用，并将在更一般的多体系统中调用其动力学性质的研究。

title: Moiré engineering of electronic phenomena in correlated oxides
title_cn: 相关氧化物中电子现象的莫尔工程
abstract: Moiré engineering has recently emerged as an effective approach to control quantum phenomena in condensed matter systems. In van der Waals heterostructures, moiré patterns can be formed by lattice misorientation between adjacent atomic layers, creating long-range electronic order. Moiré engineering has so far been executed solely in stacked van der Waals multilayers. Here we describe electronic moiré patterns in films of a prototypical magnetoresistive oxide, La0.67Sr0.33MnO3, epitaxially grown on LaAlO3 substrates. Using scanning probe nanoimaging, we observe microscopic moiré profiles attributed to the coexistence and interaction of two distinct incommensurate patterns of strain modulation within these films. The net effect is that both the electronic conductivity and ferromagnetism of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3 are modulated by periodic moiré textures extending over mesoscopic scales. Our work provides a potential route to achieving spatially patterned electronic textures on demand in strained epitaxial materials.
abstract_cn: 云纹＆＃233;最近，工程学已成为控制凝聚态系统中量子现象的有效方法。在范德华力异质结构中，莫尔＆＃233;可以通过相邻原子层之间的晶格失配来形成图形，从而产生远距离电子顺序。莫尔＆＃233;迄今为止，仅在堆叠的范德华多层系统中执行过工程。在这里，我们描述了电子云纹。在LaAlO 3 衬底上外延生长的典型磁阻氧化物La 0.67 Sr 0.33 MnO 3 的膜中的图形。使用扫描探针纳米成像，我们观察到了微观的莫尔条纹。轮廓归因于这些薄膜中两种不同的不对称应变调制模式的共存和相互作用。最终结果是，La 0.67 Sr 0.33 MnO 3 的电子电导率和铁磁性都受到周期性摩尔纹的调节。介观尺度上延伸的纹理。我们的工作为在应变外延材料中按需获得空间图案化的电子织构提供了一条可能的途径。

title: Electronic correlations in nodal-line semimetals
title_cn: 节点线半金属中的电子相关
abstract: Dirac fermions with highly dispersive linear bands are usually considered weakly correlated due to the relatively large bandwidths (W) compared to Coulomb interactions (U). With the discovery of nodal-line semimetals, the notion of the Dirac point has been extended to lines and loops in momentum space. The anisotropy associated with nodal-line structure gives rise to greatly reduced kinetic energy along the line. However, experimental evidence for the anticipated enhanced correlations in nodal-line semimetals is sparse. Here, we report on prominent correlation effects in a nodal-line semimetal compound, ZrSiSe, through a combination of optical spectroscopy and density functional theory calculations. We observed two fundamental spectroscopic hallmarks of electronic correlations: strong reduction (1/3) of the free-carrier Drude weight and also the Fermi velocity compared to predictions of density functional band theory. The renormalization of Fermi velocity can be further controlled with an external magnetic field. ZrSiSe therefore offers the rare opportunity to investigate correlation-driven physics in a Dirac system.
abstract_cn: 具有高分散线性带的狄拉克费米子通常被认为是弱相关的，这是因为与库仑相互作用（U）相比，带宽（W）相对较大。随着节点线半金属的发现，狄拉克点的概念已扩展到动量空间中的线和环。与节点线结构相关的各向异性导致沿线的动能大大降低。然而，节点线半金属中预期的增强相关性的实验证据很少。在这里，我们通过结合光谱学和密度泛函理论计算，对节点线半金属化合物ZrSiSe中的显着相关效应进行了报道。我们观察到了电子相关性的两个基本光谱学特征：与密度泛函理论的预测值相比，自由载流子Drude权重的大幅降低（1/3）以及费米速度。费米速度的重新归一化可以通过外部磁场进一步控制。因此，ZrSiSe提供了难得的机会来研究Dirac系统中由相关驱动的物理学。</ p>

title: Strong photon coupling to the quadrupole moment of an electron in a solid-state qubit
title_cn: 强光子耦合到固态量子位中电子的四极矩
abstract: The fundamental concept of light–matter interaction is routinely realized by coupling the quantized electric field in a cavity to the dipole moment of a real or an artificial atom. A recent proposal, motivated by the prospect of overcoming the decohering effects of distant charge fluctuations, suggests that introduction of and coupling to an electric quadrupole moment of a single electron can be achieved by confining it in a triple quantum dot. Here, we show an experimental realization of this concept by connecting a superconducting microwave resonator to the middle of the three dots, such that the dipole coupling becomes negligible. We demonstrate strong coupling to the electron quadrupole moment and determine that the coherence of our system is limited by short-range charge noise. Our experiment enables the construction and detection of a complex electronic state of a single electron in a solid-state environment that does not exist as such for a free electron.
abstract_cn: 光物质相互作用的基本概念通常是通过将空腔中的量子化电场耦合到真实或人造原子的偶极矩来实现的。 基于克服远距离电荷波动的退相干效应的前景，最近的一项提议表明，可以通过将单个电子限制在三量子点中来实现引入和耦合该单个电子的四极矩。 在这里，我们通过将超导微波谐振器连接到三个点的中间来显示该概念的实验实现，这样偶极耦合就可以忽略不计了。 我们证明了与电子四极矩的强耦合，并确定我们系统的相干性受到短程电荷噪声的限制。 我们的实验能够在固态环境中构造和检测单个电子的复杂电子态，而对于自由电子而言，固态环境并不存在。</ p>

title: A quantum network node with crossed optical fibre cavities
title_cn: 具有交叉光纤腔的量子网络节点
abstract: Quantum networks provide unique possibilities for resolving open questions on entanglement and promise innovative applications ranging from secure communication to scalable computation. Although two quantum nodes coupled by a single channel are adequate for basic quantum communication tasks between two parties, fully functional large-scale quantum networks require a web-like architecture with multiply connected nodes. Efficient interfaces between network nodes and channels can be implemented with optical cavities. Using two optical fibre cavities coupled to one atom, we here realize a quantum network node that connects to two quantum channels, one provided by each cavity. It functions as a passive, heralded and high-fidelity quantum memory that requires neither amplitude- and phase-critical control fields nor error-prone feedback loops. Our node is robust, fits naturally into larger fibre-based networks and has prospects for extensions including qubit-controlled quantum switches, routers and repeaters.
abstract_cn: 量子网络为解决有关纠缠的公开问题提供了独特的可能性，并有望实现从安全通信到可扩展计算的创新应用。尽管通过单个通道耦合的两个量子节点足以满足两方之间的基本量子通信任务，但是功能齐全的大规模量子网络需要具有多个连接节点的类Web架构。网络节点和通道之间的有效接口可以通过光腔实现。使用两个耦合到一个原子的光纤腔，我们在这里实现了一个量子网络节点，该节点连接到两个量子通道，每个腔提供一个。它起被动，先驱和高保真量子存储器的作用，既不需要振幅和相位关键的控制场，也不需要错误的反馈回路。我们的节点健壮，可以自然地适应更大的基于光纤的网络，并且具有扩展的前景，包括量子位控制的量子交换机，路由器和中继器。

title: Pattern formation in a driven Bose–Einstein condensate
title_cn: 在驱动的玻色-爱因斯坦冷凝物中形成图案
abstract: Pattern formation is ubiquitous in nature at all scales, from morphogenesis and cloud formation to galaxy filamentation. How patterns emerge in a homogeneous system is a fundamental question across interdisciplinary research including hydrodynamics, condensed matter physics, nonlinear optics, cosmology and bio-chemistry. Paradigmatic examples, such as Rayleigh–Bénard convection rolls and Faraday waves, have been studied extensively and found numerous applications. How such knowledge applies to quantum systems and whether the patterns in a quantum system can be controlled remain intriguing questions. Here we show that the density patterns with two- (D2), four- (D4) and six-fold (D6) symmetries can emerge in Bose–Einstein condensates on demand when the atomic interactions are modulated at multiple frequencies. The D6 pattern, in particular, arises from a resonant wave-mixing process that establishes phase coherence of the excitations that respect the symmetry. Our experiments explore a novel class of non-equilibrium phenomena in quantum gases, as well as a new route to prepare quantum states with desired correlations.
abstract_cn: 从形态发生和云形成到星系丝状化，模式形成在自然界中无处不在。模式如何在同质系统中出现是跨学科研究（包括流体力学，凝聚态物理学，非线性光学，宇宙学和生物化学）的一个基本问题。已经广泛研究了瑞利·B·纳德对流辊和法拉第波等典型例子，并发现了许多应用。这些知识如何应用于量子系统以及量子系统中的模式是否可以控制仍然是有趣的问题。在这里，我们显示密度模式具有两个（D 2 ），四个（D 4 ）和六倍（D 6 ）当原子相互作用在多个频率上进行调制时，对称性可能会按需出现在Bose爱因斯坦凝聚物中。 D 6 模式尤其是由共振混波过程产生的，该过程建立了尊重对称性的激发的相位相干性。我们的实验探索了量子气体中的一类新的非平衡现象，以及制备具有所需相关性的量子态的新途径。

title: Topological turbulence in the membrane of a living cell
title_cn: 活细胞膜中的拓扑湍流
abstract: Topological defects determine the structure and function of physical and biological matter over a wide range of scales, from the turbulent vortices in planetary atmospheres, oceans or quantum fluids to bioelectrical signalling in the heart and brain, and cell death. Many advances have been made in understanding and controlling the defect dynamics in active and passive non-equilibrium fluids. Yet, it remains unknown whether the statistical laws that govern the dynamics of defects in classical or quantum fluids extend to the active matter and information flows in living systems. Here, we show that a defect-mediated turbulence underlies the complex wave propagation patterns of Rho-GTP signalling protein on the membrane of starfish egg cells, a process relevant to cytoskeletal remodelling and cell proliferation. Our experiments reveal that the phase velocity field extracted from Rho-GTP concentration waves exhibits vortical defect motions and annihilation dynamics reminiscent of those seen in quantum systems, bacterial turbulence and active nematics. Several key statistics and scaling laws of the defect dynamics can be captured by a minimal Helmholtz–Onsager point vortex model as well as a generic complex Ginzburg–Landau continuum theory, suggesting a close correspondence between the biochemical signal propagation on the surface of a living cell and a widely studied class of two-dimensional turbulence and wave phenomena.
abstract_cn: 从行星大气，海洋或量子流体中的湍流涡流到心脏和大脑中的生物电信号传递以及细胞死亡，拓扑缺陷决定了广泛范围内的物理和生物物质的结构和功能。在了解和控制主动和被动非平衡流体中的缺陷动力学方面已取得了许多进展。然而，控制经典流体或量子流体中缺陷动态的统计定律是否扩展到生物系统中的活性物质和信息流，仍然是未知的。在这里，我们表明缺陷介导的湍流是海星卵细胞膜上Rho-GTP信号蛋白的复杂波传播模式的基础，该过程与细胞骨架重塑和细胞增殖有关。我们的实验表明，从Rho-GTP浓度波提取的相速度场表现出涡旋缺陷运动和an灭动力学，使人联想到量子系统，细菌湍流和主动向列相中的现象。最小的亥姆霍兹（Helmholtz）Onsager点涡模型以及通用复数Ginzburg（Landau）连续体理论可以捕获缺陷动力学的几个关键统计量和定律，这表明表面上生化信号传播之间存在密切的对应活细胞和一类广泛研究的二维湍流和波动现象。

title: Photon-assisted tunnelling of zero modes in a Majorana wire
title_cn: 马里亚纳线中零模的光子辅助隧穿
abstract: Hybrid nanowires with proximity-induced superconductivity in the topological regime host Majorana zero modes at their ends. Networks of such structures can produce topologically protected qubits where the fundamental energy scale is given by the inter-pair coupling EM between the zero modes belonging to different wire segments. Here we report on the spectroscopic measurement of EM in an InAs/Al double-island device by tracking the position of the microwave-induced quasiparticle excitations using a radiofrequency charge sensor. At zero magnetic field, photon-assisted tunnelling of Cooper pairs allows us to estimate the Josephson coupling between the islands. In the presence of a magnetic field aligned along the nanowire, we observe the 1e periodic excitation spectrum resulting from a zero-energy subgap state that emerges in a magnetic field. The discrete 1e periodic excitation spectrum is consistent with the coherent hybridization of single-electron states belonging to two opposite-parity branches. The dependence of excitation frequency on detuning indicates a sizable (GHz-scale) and controllable hybridization of zero modes across the junction separating islands, a requirement for applications related to Majorana-based qubits.
abstract_cn: 在拓扑状态下具有邻近感应超导性的混合纳米线在其末端具有Majorana零模式。这种结构的网络可以产生受拓扑保护的量子位，其中基本能量标度由属于不同线段的零模之间的线对间耦合E M 给出。在这里，我们通过使用射频电荷传感器跟踪微波诱导的准粒子激发的位置，报告了InAs / Al双岛装置中E M 的光谱测量。在零磁场下，库珀对的光子辅助隧穿使我们能够估计岛之间的约瑟夫森耦合。在沿着纳米线排列的磁场存在下，我们观察到1e周期性激发光谱，该光谱是由磁场中出现的零能子能隙状态产生的。离散的1e周期激发光谱与属于两个相反奇偶分支的单电子态的相干杂交相一致。激励频率对失谐的依赖性表明，在交界处的各个分离岛上，零模有相当大的（GHz尺度）和可控的杂化，这是与基于Majorana的量子位相关的应用的要求。

title: Magnetically driven phonon instability enables the metal–insulator transition in h-FeS
title_cn: 磁驱动声子的不稳定性使h-FeS中的金属-绝缘体跃迁
abstract: Hexagonal iron sulfide exhibits a fascinating coexistence of metal–insulator, structural and magnetic transitions, reflecting an intimate interplay of its spin, phonon and charge degrees of freedom. Here, we show how a subtle competition of energetic and entropic free-energy components governs its thermodynamics and the sequence of phase transitions it undergoes upon cooling. By means of comprehensive neutron and X-ray scattering measurements, and supported by first-principles electronic structure simulations, we identify the critical role of the coupling between antiferromagnetic ordering and instabilities of anharmonic phonons in the metallic phase in driving the metal–insulator transition. The antiferromagnetic ordering enables the emergence of two zone-boundary soft phonons, whose coupling to a zone-centre mode drives the lattice distortion opening the electronic bandgap. Simultaneously, spin–lattice coupling opens a gap in the magnon spectrum that controls the entropy component of the metal–insulator transition free energy. These results reveal the importance of spin–phonon coupling to tune anharmonic effects, thus opening new avenues to design novel technologically important materials harbouring the metal–insulator transition and magnetoelectric behaviours.
abstract_cn: 六角形的硫化铁表现出令人着迷的金属，绝缘体，结构和磁性跃迁共存，反映出其自旋，声子和电荷自由度的密切相互作用。在这里，我们展示了高能和熵自由能组分之间的微妙竞争如何控制其热力学以及冷却时相变的顺序。通过全面的中子和X射线散射测量，并得到第一性原理电子结构仿真的支持，我们确定了反铁磁有序性与非谐波声子在金属相中的不稳定性之间的耦合在驱动金属绝缘体中的关键作用过渡。反铁磁有序能够实现两个区域边界软声子的出现，它们耦合到区域中心模式会驱动电子带隙打开的晶格畸变。同时，自旋晶格耦合在磁能谱中打开了一个间隙，该间隙控制着金属绝缘体跃迁自由能的熵分量。这些结果揭示了自旋声子耦合对调和非谐效应的重要性，从而开辟了新的途径来设计具有金属绝缘体过渡和磁电行为的技术上新颖的重要材料。

title: Quantum metasurfaces with atom arrays
title_cn: 具有原子阵列的量子超表面
abstract: Metasurfaces mould the flow of classical light waves by engineering subwavelength patterns from dielectric or metallic thin films. We introduce and analyse a method in which quantum operator-valued reflectivity can be used to control both the spatiotemporal and quantum properties of transmitted and reflected light. Such quantum metasurfaces are realized by entangling the macroscopic response of atomically thin atom arrays to light. We show that such a system allows for parallel quantum operations between atoms and photons as well as for the generation of highly entangled photonic states such as photonic Greenberger–Horne–Zeilinger and three-dimensional cluster states suitable for quantum information processing. We analyse the influence of imperfections as well as specific implementations based on atom arrays excited into Rydberg states.
abstract_cn: Metasurfaces通过工程化来自电介质或金属薄膜的亚波长图案来塑造经典光波的流动。 我们介绍并分析了一种方法，其中量子算子值反射率可用于控制透射光和反射光的时空和量子特性。 这种量子超表面是通过纠缠原子薄原子阵列对光的宏观响应而实现的。 我们表明，这样的系统允许原子和光子之间的并行量子操作，以及生成高度纠缠的光子状态，例如光子Greenberger，Horne，Zeilinger和适用于量子信息处理的三维簇状态。 我们基于激发到里德堡态的原子阵列分析了缺陷的影响以及具体实现。

title: Universal scaling of active nematic turbulence
title_cn: 主动向列湍流的普遍尺度
abstract: A landmark of turbulence is the emergence of universal scaling laws, such as Kolmogorov’s E(q) ~ q−5∕3 scaling of the kinetic energy spectrum of inertial turbulence with the wavevector q. In recent years, active fluids have been shown to exhibit turbulent-like flows at low Reynolds number. However, the existence of universal scaling properties in these flows has remained unclear. To address this issue, here we propose a minimal defect-free hydrodynamic theory for two-dimensional active nematic fluids at vanishing Reynolds number. By means of large-scale simulations and analytical arguments, we show that the kinetic energy spectrum exhibits a universal scaling E(q) ~ q−1 at long wavelengths. We find that the energy injection due to activity has a peak at a characteristic length scale, which is selected by a nonlinear mechanism. In contrast to inertial turbulence, energy is entirely dissipated at the scale where it is injected, thus precluding energy cascades. Nevertheless, the non-local character of the Stokes flow establishes long-range velocity correlations, which lead to the scaling behaviour. We conclude that active nematic fluids define a distinct universality class of turbulence at low Reynolds number.
abstract_cn: 湍流的一个里程碑是普遍标度定律的出现，例如动能谱的Kolmogorov E（q）〜q ＆＃8722; 5＆＃8725; 3 标度波矢量q的惯性湍流。近年来，已经证明活性流体在低雷诺数下表现出湍流状的流动。但是，尚不清楚这些流中是否存在通用缩放属性。为了解决这个问题，在这里我们提出了二维零雷诺数下的二维活性向列流体的最小无缺陷流体力学理论。通过大规模的模拟和分析论证，我们表明，动能谱在长波长处表现出普遍的标度E（q）〜q ＆＃8722; 1 。我们发现，由于活动引起的能量注入在特征长度尺度上具有一个峰值，这是通过非线性机制选择的。与惯性湍流相反，能量在其注入的尺度上完全消散，因此排除了能量级联。然而，斯托克斯流的非局部特征建立了远距离速度相关性，这导致了比例缩放行为。我们得出的结论是，在低雷诺数下，活性向列流体定义了独特的湍流普遍性类别。

title: Flexible filaments buckle into helicoidal shapes in strong compressional flows
title_cn: 柔性长丝在强压缩流中弯曲成螺旋形状
abstract: The occurrence of coiled or helical morphologies is common in nature, from plant roots to DNA packaging into viral capsids, as well as in applications such as oil drilling processes. In many examples, chiral structures result from the buckling of a straight fibre either with intrinsic twist or to which end moments have been applied in addition to compression forces. Here, we elucidate a generic way to form regular helicoidal shapes from achiral straight filaments transported in viscous flows with free ends. Through a combination of experiments using fluorescently labelled actin filaments in microfluidic divergent flows and two distinct sets of numerical simulations, we demonstrate the robustness of helix formation. A nonlinear stability analysis is performed, and explains the emergence of such chiral structures from the nonlinear interaction of perpendicular planar buckling modes, an effect that solely requires a strong compressional flow, independent of the exact nature of the fibre or type of flow field. The fundamental mechanism for the uncovered morphological transition and characterization of the emerging conformations advance our understanding of several biological and industrial processes and can also be exploited for the controlled microfabrication of chiral objects.
abstract_cn: 从植物根部到将DNA包装到病毒衣壳中，以及在诸如石油钻探工艺等应用中，盘绕或螺旋形形态的发生在自然界都是很常见的。在许多例子中，手性结构是由于直纤维弯曲而产生的，该弯曲具有固有的扭曲或除了压缩力外还施加了端力矩。在这里，我们阐明了一种一般方法，该方法可以通过以自由端的粘性流形式运输的非手性直丝形成规则的螺旋形状。通过在微流体发散流中使用荧光标记的肌动蛋白丝进行实验的结合以及两组不同的数值模拟，我们证明了螺旋形成的稳健性。进行了非线性稳定性分析，并从垂直平面屈曲模态的非线性相互作用解释了这种手性结构的出现，这种效应仅需要强大的压缩流，而与纤维的确切性质或流场类型无关。未发现的形态转变和新兴构象表征的基本机理使我们对一些生物学和工业过程有了更深入的了解，也可用于手性对象的受控微加工。

title: Remote determination of the shape of Jupiter's vortices from laboratory experiments
title_cn: 通过实验室实验远程确定木星旋涡的形状
abstract: Jupiter’s dynamics shapes its cloud patterns but remains largely unknown below this natural observational barrier. Unravelling the underlying three-dimensional flows is thus a primary goal for NASA’s ongoing Juno mission, which was launched in 2011. Here, we address the dynamics of large Jovian vortices using laboratory experiments complemented by theoretical and numerical analyses. We determine the generic force balance responsible for their three-dimensional pancake-like shape. From this, we define scaling laws for their horizontal and vertical aspect ratios as a function of the ambient rotation, stratification and zonal wind velocity. For the Great Red Spot in particular, our predicted horizontal dimensions agree well with measurements at the cloud level since the Voyager mission in 1979. We also predict the Great Red Spot’s thickness, which is inaccessible to direct observation. It has remained surprisingly constant despite the observed horizontal shrinking. Our results now await comparison with upcoming Juno observations.
abstract_cn: 木星的动力学形状决定了它的云模式，但在这种自然的观测障碍之下仍然未知。因此，揭示潜在的三维流动是NASA正在进行的Juno任务的主要目标，该任务于2011年启动。在这里，我们通过实验室实验以及理论和数值分析来解决大型木星涡旋的动力学问题。我们确定造成其类似于煎饼的三维形状的通用力平衡。由此，我们定义了它们的水平和垂直纵横比的缩放定律，作为环境旋转，分层和纬向风速的函数。特别是对于大红斑，自1979年旅行者计划执行任务以来，我们预测的水平尺寸与云层水平的测量值非常吻合。我们还预测了大红斑的厚度，这是直接观察无法获得的。尽管观察到水平收缩，但它仍保持令人惊讶的恒定。现在，我们的结果正在等待与即将进行的Juno观测结果进行比较。
